entry.title: Wednesday night: A few flurries. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending late this evening then clearing. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light after midnight. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 6:18 PM EDT Wednesday 19 April 2023
